sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react'
import {useDispatch} from 'react-redux'
import {Form, Label, FormText, FormGroup, Input,  Button} from "reactstrap"
import FileBase from "react-file-base64"
import { createPost } from '../../REDUX/action/action'
import "./form.css"


const FormElements = () =>  {
    
            // UseState Hook that defines our  database collection and take its value also control
        const [inputData, setInputData] = useState({creator:'', title:'', message:'', tags:'', selectedFile:''})
        const dispatch = useDispatch()
// HandleSubmit will send data received from form elements to backEnd

    const handleSubmit = () => {
        dispatch(createPost())
    }

    return (
        <Form className="w-50 main-form d-flex" onSubmit={handleSubmit}>
        <FormGroup>
        <FormText color="light">
        Share your short impression
        </FormText>
      </FormGroup>
      <FormGroup>
        <Label for="creator">Creator</Label>
        <Input
         type="text"
         name="email" 
         id="creator" 
         placeholder="type your name..." 
         value={inputData.creator}
         onChange={(e)=> setInputData({...inputData, creator: e.target.value})}/>
      </FormGroup>
      <FormGroup>
        <Label for="title">Title</Label>
        <Input
         type="text"
         name="title" 
         id="title"
         placeholder="title..."
         value={inputData.title}
         onChange={(e)=>setInputData({...inputData, title: e.target.value})}/>
      </FormGroup>
      <FormGroup>
        <Label for="title">Tags</Label>
        <Input 
        type="text" 
        name="title"
         id="tags" 
         placeholder="to your friends"
         value={inputData.tags}
         onChange={(e)=>setInputData({...inputData, tags: e.target.value})} />
      </FormGroup>
      <FormGroup>
        <Label for="message">Your impression</Label>
        <Input 
         type="textarea"
         name="text" 
         id="text" 
         placeholder="share your impression" 
         className="text-area"
         cols="30" rows="5"
         value={inputData.message}
         onChange={(e)=>setInputData({...inputData, message: e.target.value})} />
      </FormGroup>
      <FileBase
        type="file"
        multiple={false}
        onDone ={({base64}) => setInputData({...inputData, selectedFile: base64})}/>
      <Button type="submit" className="btn btn-success">Submit</Button>
    </Form>
    )
}

export default FormElements
